articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Apple’s big updates for Intel-based Macs will end with Tahoe - The Verge
articles.description: Apple announced at WWDC that macOS Tahoe will be the last full update available for Intel-based Macs
articles.content:
Apple phased Intel-based Macs out of its product lines years ago, and now its cutting off software updates, too.
Macs equipped with an Intel chip will no longer receive major software updates after … [+1495 chars]

articles.title: Apple brings back tabs to the Photos app in iOS 26 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple said Monday at the Worldwide Developers Conference it was bringing back a tabbed interface to Photos in its new OS release.
articles.content:

articles.title: Apple stock dropped as WWDC got going. Here's why. - Business Insider
articles.description: Apple's stock suddenly dropped a few minutes into its WWDC keynote, highlighting relatively slow AI development compared to Big Tech rivals.
articles.content:
